TopicTitle: Extended stage actions. Like action groups, but for stages.

Articles.Content:
Extended Stage Actions

The concept: A tab next to the action group editor, crew, and parts. Allows for advanced staging like triggering an engine three seconds after staging, enabling RCS ports after a fairing is staged, etc. "Modules" would be dragged into each stages "action group" like MIT's Scratch.

Example:

STAGE 0 -----------

Wait 3 Seconds

          Enable Selected RCS Ports

          Enable RCS
Realism Overhaul players will love this for the fuel ullage motors stuff...i will love it for starting VTOL engines mounted inside a cargo bay
